DOC.brief_title: Performance-based Reinforcement Enhance Cognitive Remediation Therapy
DOC.detailed_description: Forty individual seek treatment alcohol cocaine use disorder Substance Abuse Treatment Unit ( SATU ) randomize receive cognitive remediation therapy without additional compensation base performance . Participants use computerized cognitive remediation program ( PSSCogRehab 2012 ) three time per week four week . The primary outcome measure improve performance computerized task , secondary outcome change cognitive functioning ( e.g. , attention , concentration , memory ) measure neuropsychological test baseline post-treatment .
